title: When i launch Lol my display crashes

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: When i launch Lol my display crashes.I wait until launch but bugsplat is opened.If i close Lol my display is alright but i want play please help me

replies.body:
It definitely looks like there's a driver or hardware issue going on here. I strongly recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) in its entirety to ensure this can't be easily resolved.

Please let me know if you continue to experience this issue after working through those steps.
